ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_rainbow] Re: Intro and "Woof"
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok - I ll stop lurking and join in on this ! First Name:	Bob City/State/Country:	Annandale / Virginia / USA Gender:	Male Home Page: None Relationship status:
ygData.messageBody:
Ok - I'll stop lurking and join in on this !

First Name: Bob
City/State/Country: Annandale / Virginia / USA
Gender: Male
Home Page: None
Relationship status: 22 years might-as-well-be-married partnership with
wonderful, sweet, non-computer gardener type!
Main Character (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level): Hissie - Mith Marr - Necro -
Iksar - 10
Any other characters (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level): Klek - Mith Marr -
Shaman - Troll - 21
Favorite EQ Monster: Spiders - love to hear their death scream !
Most Hated EQ Monster: Giants in Oasis - they always sneak up on me !
Favorite TV Show: STV / X-Files / Any Science Fiction series
Favorite Author: Robert Jordan / Andre Norton - the list goes on !
Any non-EQ hobbies: Reading / Gardening / Antiques / Parrots / Ethnic
Cooking / Decorating
A few words that describe you: I'm the shy quiet type until I get to know
you - then watch out ! I'm not the bar type - been there - done that ! Most
weekends you'll find us at a craft show or antique shop or in the kitchen
cooking for partner's nephew and his new boyfriend. I love to cook
vietnamese, chinese and am learning to cook thai.

-----Original Message-----
From: Tim Chandler [mailto:tim.chandler@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 9:54 AM
To: EQ_rainbow@egroups.com
Subject: [EQ_rainbow] Re: Intro and "Woof"

Sounds like it may be a good idea to start a 'roster' of folks here.

How about we get a little intro from as many people on the list who want to
contribute? I created a template, feel free to modify it or add to it, but
I want to keep it short enough that people will actually fill it out.
Perhaps someone could keep this list, and we could publish it monthly?

I'll start.

First Name: Tim
City/State/Country: Atlanta, GA, USA
Gender: Male
Home Page: http://www.leatherpa.com/bootshiner
Relationship status: open relationship
Main Character (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Roshen-The Rathe-Druid-Halfling-31
Any other characters (Name-Server-Class-Race-Level):
Lizi-Vallon Zek-Enchantress-Dark Elf-15
Favorite EQ Monster: Hill Giants, for the loot they drop.
Most Hated EQ Monster: The pirate in High Hold who holds the components for
the Testament of Vanear quest.
Favorite TV Show: Charmed
Favorite Author: David Eddings
Any non-EQ hobbies: Bridge
A few words that describe you: A basic leather cub who needs more time to
play EQ these days.
